headline20: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 10 airports right now.
management45: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 10 airports right now. Across base airports: 3 critical, 14 high, 22 medium. Base airports needing attention include London Luton (LTN/EGGW), Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR), Chişinău (RMO/LUKK), Iaşi (IAS/LRIA) and Katowice Wojciech Korfanty (KTW/EPKT) and 12 others. Other base airports are mostly medium severity and should be monitored (22 flagged). At base airports, the main issues are snow and runway contamination risk at Poznań-Ławica (POZ/EPPO), Chişinău (RMO/LUKK), Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR) and Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD) and 1 others, low cloud base at Craiova (CRA/LRCV), Poznań-Ławica (POZ/EPPO), Chişinău (RMO/LUKK) and Iaşi (IAS/LRIA) and 12 others, and mist at Craiova (CRA/LRCV), Poznań-Ławica (POZ/EPPO), Chişinău (RMO/LUKK) and Iaşi (IAS/LRIA) and 10 others. Across the network, the worst‑affected airports include Al Massira (AGA/GMAD), Stuttgart (STR/EDDS), Turku (TKU/EFTU), Lublin (LUZ/EPLB), Poznań-Ławica (POZ/EPPO), Olsztyn-Mazury (SZY/EPSY) and 4 others. Primary drivers are low cloud base, mist and cold‑temperature performance penalties. Expected impact: reduced runway capacity and higher delay/diversion risk at the worst‑affected airports, especially where visibility/RVR and cloud base are very low. Since the last update, 12 airports changed status, led by Al Massira (AGA/GMAD), Stuttgart (STR/EDDS), Turku (TKU/EFTU), Lublin (LUZ/EPLB), Poznań-Ławica (POZ/EPPO), Olsztyn-Mazury (SZY/EPSY) and 6 others.
detail90: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 10 airports right now. Base airports (focus): London Luton (LTN/EGGW) — HIGH: fog; strong gusts risk; visibility down to 300 m, cloud base around 100 ft | Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR) — HIGH: fog; runway contamination risk; cold-temperature performance penalties | Chişinău (RMO/LUKK) — HIGH: mist; runway contamination risk; cold-temperature performance penalties | Iaşi (IAS/LRIA) — HIGH: mist; cloud base around 200 ft; below alternate minima (current METAR) | Katowice Wojciech Korfanty (KTW/EPKT) — HIGH: freezing fog; cold-temperature performance penalties; visibility down to 300 m, cloud base around 100 ft | Bucharest Henri Coandă (OTP/LROP) — HIGH: mist; cloud base around 200 ft and 11 others. Worst affected now: Al Massira (AGA/GMAD) — CRIT: fog; visibility down to 500 m, cloud base around 100 ft; below approach minima (current METAR) (drivers: approach minima limits, very low visibility, low ceilings) | Stuttgart (STR/EDDS) — CRIT: freezing fog; cold-temperature performance penalties; visibility down to 600 m, cloud base around 100 ft (drivers: runway visual range (RVR) constraints, cold-temperature performance penalties, very low visibility) | Turku (TKU/EFTU) — CRIT: mist; snow; cold-temperature performance penalties (drivers: cold-temperature performance penalties, low ceilings, mist) | Lublin (LUZ/EPLB) — CRIT: mist; snow; runway contamination risk (drivers: approach minima limits, runway contamination / reduced braking, cold-temperature performance penalties) | Poznań-Ławica (POZ/EPPO) — CRIT: mist; snow; runway contamination risk (drivers: approach minima limits, runway contamination / reduced braking, cold-temperature performance penalties) | Olsztyn-Mazury (SZY/EPSY) — CRIT: mist; snow; runway contamination risk (drivers: crosswind limitations, runway contamination / reduced braking, cold-temperature performance penalties) and 4 others. Changed since last run: Al Massira (AGA/GMAD), Stuttgart (STR/EDDS), Turku (TKU/EFTU), Lublin (LUZ/EPLB), Poznań-Ławica (POZ/EPPO), Olsztyn-Mazury (SZY/EPSY), Adolfo Suárez Madrid–Barajas (MAD/LEMD), Valencia (VLC/LEVC), Craiova (CRA/LRCV), David the Builder Kutaisi (KUT/UGKO) and 2 others.
